mapper.select: SELECT m.userCode, email, userName, userType, nickName, regDate, lastLogin, gender, enabled, TO_CHAR(regDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') regDate, endDate, TO_CHAR(payDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') startDate FROM member m LEFT OUTER JOIN payment p ON m.userCode = p.userCode WHERE m.userCode = #{userCode} ORDER BY endDate DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET failure_cnt = 0 WHERE userCode = #{userCode}
UPDATE member SET enabled= #{enabled} WHERE userCode = #{userCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO state(stateNum, userCode, stateCode, memo, registerCode, register_date) VALUES (state_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userCode}, #{stateCode}, #{memo}, #{registerCode}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT stateNum, s.userCode, stateCode, memo, registerCode, register_date FROM state s JOIN member m ON s.userCode = m.userCode WHERE s.userCode = #{userCode} ORDER BY stateNum DESC
SELECT stateNum, userCode, stateCode, memo, registerCode, register_date FROM state WHERE userCode = #{userCode} ORDER BY stateNum DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
SELECT paymentNum, endDate, TO_CHAR(payDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') startDate, TO_CHAR(payDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') payDate FROM payment WHERE userCode = #{userCode} ORDER BY paymentNum DESC
